Home / Program

Program highlights

Preview the sessions, topics, and formats planned for the conference week.

Featured session formats

PNSQC offers a mix of keynotes, breakout sessions, tutorials, and interactive labs to meet diverse learning needs.

Keynote

Visionary talks

Industry leaders share the future of quality engineering, AI, and software delivery.

Breakout

Practical sessions

Case studies and lessons learned from teams navigating real-world quality challenges.

Tutorial

Guided learning

Structured, instructor-led walkthroughs for new tools, frameworks, and methodologies.

Forum

Community exchange

Facilitated discussions for leaders, managers, and practitioners to share insights.

Sample agenda

A snapshot of conference sessions to help you plan your schedule.

Time Session Track
9:00 AM Opening keynote: Quality leadership in an AI-first world Leadership
10:30 AM Building resilient test automation pipelines Engineering Excellence
1:00 PM Continuous quality metrics that executives trust Quality Strategy
2:30 PM Exploratory testing in modern product teams People & Culture
4:00 PM Panel: Scaling quality with distributed teams Community Forum

Call for proposals

We invite speakers to share stories, frameworks, and research that help the community elevate software quality. Submissions are reviewed by the program committee and selected based on impact and relevance.

  • Session lengths range from 30 to 90 minutes, including Q&A.
  • Formats include workshops, panels, and lightning talks.
  • Support available for first-time speakers and new topics.

Program updates

Full schedules and speaker profiles will be published as sessions are confirmed.

Submit a proposal
